item.description:
Where: Corner Pocket/ Wave Sport Pub in Waltham. 411 Waverley Oaks Road, Suite 204, Waltham, MA 02452 Tel: (781) 894-7011
Note: Its in the Second Row of industrial Buildings, Building #2. Park between the Row of 2 big buildings. The entrance has a White Sign for the Wave and Corner Pocket Pool do not enter from Gym side please it has a keypad access only and you cannot get in that way!

Helpful hint: Drive between the 2 buildings till you see the White Sign for the Wave and Corner Pocket Pool so you know where the entrance is.

Web site: http://www.wavesports....

Join us for Free Pool at the Exclusive Corner Pocket Club at 7:00 pm. We will meet in the Pool Lounge to the right after you walk up the stairs. Meet by the Juke Box and then we will grab some tables.
We will swap/rotate people around in groups to play against each other. I just need a few people to come early like 6:50PM to be ready to snag a few pool tables at 7:00PM, when they are free, we will get charged before then so wait til 7PM.

If people can come early at 6:50PM to help grab 4 tables that would be great.

How to find us: There are many photos of me (Biagio) so you can find me. I will be on the right as you enter the pool hall room please gather by the juke box so I can look for you, if you don't find me!


FROM BOSTON
Take Storrow Drive West towards Watertown. After the Harvard Square exit, take the Fresh Pond Parkway exit (Route16). Go over the Bridge and follow signs for Rte 16 Watertown. Take a right after the Star Market onto Belmont Street. This will turn into Trapelo Road. Stay on Trapelo Road / Belmont Street until you come to your third set of lights. At lights take a left onto Route 60, which is Waverley Oaks Road. Less than a ¼ mile down on the left is an industrial park . We are located in building #2. Look for the awing that says THE WAVE SPORTS PUB.

FROM RTE 128
Take route 128 towards Waltham to the Trapelo Road exit (28). Follow the signs for Belmont. You will stay on Trapelo Road for approximately 4 ½ miles. You will come to a set of lights and see a sign for Route 60, Waltham. Take that right at lights which is Route 60 / Waverley Oaks Road. Less than a ¼ mile down on the left is an industrial park. We are located in Building #2. Look for the awning that says THE WAVE SPORTS PUB.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Biagio and other members of Social Fun :) I won't be going :(
item.name: Free pool Saturdays!
